page.title: 07VILLAGE SCHOOL-SCREDINGTON.
page.content: In our block there is one school, a Primary School which is one of the smallest schools in the area.The school was built in 1877 and consists of just one room which is 6m wide and 16m long. The room has a partition accross it and one end of the school is used by the Infants and the other by the Juniors We bring a packed lunch .Inside the school there are two small cloakrooms with sinks. In school we have a computer and a cooker which we use. The school toilets are outside ,we have a climbing frame on the school garden.In the playground we have a netball pitch, a small tennis court, a football target and a hopscotch area. In our school there are only 27 children we have two teachers one dinner lady , a secretary and a caretaker who is my mum.
